name: WD My Passport Ultra 500GB Portable External Hard Drive, Titanium

reviews.name: WD My Passport Ultra 500GB Portable External Hard Drive, Titanium
reviews.reviewText: People tend to keep to many photos and music tracks on there PC's. It is better for your PC and safer to keep them on a portable with the usb. You can save as many as you want and get instant access to them by simply plugging it in.
reviews.title: Nice Portable Hard Drive

reviews.name: WD My Passport Ultra 500GB Portable External Hard Drive, Titanium
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Must be plugged directly into USB port. Can't connect to computer through a hub..
reviews.title: Great compact storage device

reviews.name: WD My Passport Ultra 500GB Portable External Hard Drive, Titanium
reviews.reviewText: delivered as promised, and just what I expected when I ordered it at a better price than purchasing in store.
reviews.title: another Christmas shopping experience
